alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued January 12 at 10:50AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...AN AIR QUALITY ADVISORY HAS BEEN ISSUED BY THE IDAHO DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY... Due to elevated pollutant levels, the air quality is forecast to become unhealthy for sensitive groups in Franklin County, including the city of Preston among other. This advisory will remain in effect until air quality has significantly improved. Those individuals who are sensitive to increased particulate or smoke levels are encouraged to limit prolonged or strenuous outdoor activity. An increase in symptoms of asthma and other respiratory ailments are likely. Your cooperation is appreciated. Another statement will be issued about 10 AM MST Thursday. For more information please access the departments website at http://airquality.deq.idaho.gov This statement is issued by the Idaho Department of Environmental Quality, Air Quality Division, Pocatello Idaho Regional Office. Contact at 208 236 6160.
